div.p: To better illustrate the Outcome Criteria Framework, this guide includes a comprehensive Depression Outcomes example, as illustrated by the following Figure. Sections that follow describe the components of this example.
Contains a CQL library that encodes depression outcome criteria as defined by the AHRQ expert panel.

ul.li:
Adheres to normative organizational framework
References CQL library: depressionOutcomes
Deliberately redundant with referenced CQL's 'using' and 'include'.

Adheres to normative semantic framework
Conforms to OutcomeCriteriaFrameworkLibrary profile

div.p: Encodes depression outcome criteria as defined by the AHRQ expert panel.

ul.li:
Adheres to normative organizational framework
Wrapped in a FHIR Library resource
CQL library is a stand-alone file
Deliberately redundant with FHIR Library's relatedArtifact (depends-on) field.

Adheres to normative semantic framework
CQL contains conformant declarations (library, identifier, version, code systems, value sets)
CQL logic addresses all attributes where isModifier=true
QI Core is used as data model.

Implements non-normative guidance
Both time-neutral and time-specific definitions
Condition status values not constrained (depression)
Condition-neutral criteria (all-cause-mortality)

Adheres to normative organizational framework
References FHIR Library: depressionMeasure
Expressions are contained in CQL library referenced by FHIR Library

Adheres to normative semantic framework
Uses FHIR Measure resource for quality measurement

div.p: Contains a CQL library that encodes measure-specific criteria (such as Denominator criteria).

ul.li:
Adheres to normative organizational framework
References CQL library: depressionMeasure
Deliberately redundant with referenced CQL's 'using' and 'include'.

Adheres to normative semantic framework
Conforms to OutcomeCriteriaFrameworkLibrary profile

div.p: Encodes measure-specific criteria (such as Denominator criteria).

ul.li:
Adheres to normative organizational framework
Wrapped in a FHIR Library resource
CQL library is a stand-alone file
Deliberately redundant with FHIR Library's relatedArtifact (depends-on) field.

Adheres to normative semantic framework
CQL contains conformant declarations (library, identifier, version, code systems, value sets)
CQL logic addresses all attributes where isModifier=true
QI Core is used as data model

Implements non-normative guidance
Both time-neutral and time-specific definitions
Condition status values not constrained (depression)
Condition-neutral criteria (all-cause-mortality)

Adheres to normative organizational framework
References FHIR Library: depressionIntervention
Expressions are contained in CQL library referenced by FHIR Library

Adheres to normative semantic framework
Uses FHIR PlanDefinition resource for clinical decision support

div.p: Contains a CQL library that encodes decision support criteria (such as Trigger criteria).

ul.li:
Adheres to normative organizational framework
References CQL library: depressionIntervention
Deliberately redundant with referenced CQL's 'using' and 'include'.

Adheres to normative semantic framework
Conforms to OutcomeCriteriaFrameworkLibrary profile

div.p: Encodes decision support criteria (such as Trigger criteria).

ul.li:
Adheres to normative organizational framework
Wrapped in a FHIR Library resource
CQL library is a stand-alone file
Deliberately redundant with FHIR Library's relatedArtifact (depends-on) field.

Adheres to normative semantic framework
CQL contains conformant declarations (library, identifier, version, code systems, value sets)
CQL logic addresses all attributes where isModifier=true
QI Core is used as data model.

Implements non-normative guidance
Both time-neutral and time-specific definitions
Condition status values not constrained (depression)
Condition-neutral criteria (all-cause-mortality)s
